snippet.title: ERIKSHOLM: The Stolen Dream | OFFICIAL NEW EXTENDED GAMEPLAY TRAILER | Nordcurrent Labs
snippet.description:
"Eriksholm: The Stolen Dream" is coming 2025. Wishlist and follow on all platforms now:

✨ Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2377280/Eriksholm_The_Stolen_Dream/
✨ Epic Games Store - https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/eriksholm-the-stolen-dream-c90ad9
✨ PlayStation5 - https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10009571/
✨ Xbox Series X|S - TBA

༻¨*:·.   Experience an isometric, narrative-driven stealth game and join Hanna’s adventure in the vibrant city of Eriksholm. The mysterious disappearance of her brother, Herman, ignites a chain of catastrophic events that will forever change their lives and the fate of the entire city.   .·:*¨༺

____________________________

To stay up-to-date on Eriksholm: The Stolen Dream, follow us in on X (Twitter) & YouTube, and join the community on Discord: 

Nordcurrent Labs: 
https://twitter.com/NordcurrentLabs
https://discord.gg/Bey4EZsQbs

River End Games: 
https://riverendgames.com

Official web page: 
https://eriksholmgame.com

#eriksholm #eriksholmthestolendream #riverendgames #nordcurrentlabs
